name: Scareclaw Twinsaw
effectText: Tribute 1 "Scareclaw" monster, then target 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them, and if you do, if you control "Visas Starfrost", banish those destroyed cards instead of sending them to the GY. If a Link-3 or higher monster is on the field: You can banish this card from your GY; for the rest of this turn, neither player can activate the effects of Link Monsters on the field. You can only activate 1 "Scareclaw Twinsaw" per turn.
